properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters east of Ipswich Bay and the Stellwagen Bank National Marine Sanctuary
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 8 at 6:50PM EST until February 9 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 4 to 7 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters east of Ipswich Bay and the Stellwagen
Bank National Marine Sanctuary.

* WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SUNDAY... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
